document_data.name: Suppress Glyph
document_data.mainbody: '''''Suppress glyph''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s. The spell originated from [[Deneir]], the Lord of All Glyphs.
document_data.Effects: This spell enhanced the caster's awareness to magical writings, bathing such writings in pale blue light. The caster could read magical writings without triggering any harmful effects for the spell's duration.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
